sysevent_email_template.message_html:
Morning Checklist ${u_glide_date_1} 
Created by: ${sys_created_by}

 IPMONITOR:   ${ipmon}  ${ipmon_info}
 ROUTERS DOWN:  ${routers}  ${routers_info}
 CHECK ALERTS MAILBOX:   ${alertmb}  ${alertmb_info}

 LOTUS:   ${lotus}  ${lotus_info}
 BI – CHECK SCHEDULED REPORTS:  ${bi}  ${bi_info}
 NATIONAL UNIBIS:   ${natunibis}  ${natunibis_info}
 EDI (DOCORIGIN DIRECTORY ISSUES):   ${edi}  ${edi_info}

 RUSHMORE SALES REPORT:   ${rm_unibis}  ${rm_unibis_info}
 AUTOTICS:   ${autotics}  ${autotics_info}
 MAINTARC:   ${maintarc}  ${maintarc_info}
 CHECK RECV+PROC & MAINT SENT:   ${rcvprcmaint}  ${rcvprcmaint_info}
 BRUN:  ${brun}  ${brun_info}
 CHECK REJECTS:   ${rejects}  ${rejects_info}
 Operational monitoring of CPM application:   ${cpm}  ${cpm_info}
 Failed Backups - Overnight:   ${bupson}  ${bupson_info}
 Failed Backups - Major:   ${bupsm}  ${bupsm_info}
